alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Laurens; Washington; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 16 at 11:53AM EST until January 17 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Ocmulgee River at Abbeville affecting Telfair, Dodge and Wilcox Counties. Ocmulgee River at US 341 at Hawkinsville affecting Bleckley and Pulaski Counties. Oconee River at Dublin affecting Washington, Wilkinson, Johnson and Laurens Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding will continue. * WHERE...Oconee River at Dublin. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, Minor flooding continues in the woodlands and natural flood plain along the river upstream and downstream from the gage on U.S. Highway 80. Portions of some dirt river access roads will begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:45 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 21.7 feet and falling. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:45 AM EST Tuesday was 23.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this evening and continue falling to 3.8 feet Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 21 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta. The next statement will be issued late tonight at midnight EST.
